function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of knowledge about SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission in the workplace","Mitigation":"Education and training on SARS-CoV-2 transmission and preventive measures","Technologies":"Training materials, virtual simulations","People":"Employees, customers, colleagues","Owner":"Employers, health and safety personnel"},{"Description":"Ineffective preventive measures for subsequent endemic SARS-CoV-2 waves","Impact":"Potential for continued outbreaks in the workplace","Mitigation":"Regular updates and adaptation of preventive measures based on latest research","Technologies":"Continuous monitoring and communication of research findings","People":"Employees, employers, health and safety personnel","Owner":"Employers, health and safety personnel"},{"Description":"Inadequate PPE usage leading to increased transmission risk","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus transmission in the workplace","Mitigation":"Training on proper PPE usage, supervision and monitoring of compliance","Technologies":"Training modules, PPE monitoring systems","People":"Employees, health and safety personnel","Owner":"Employers, health and safety personnel"}]}
